Utterance: Hi! Welcome back! How have you been since our last session?
Hi! I’ve been doing alright. I actually applied to a couple of jobs!
That’s fantastic! How did that go for you?
It felt good to finally take that step. I applied to three places.
That’s great to hear! How did you feel about the applications?
A bit nervous, but also relieved to have done it.
It’s completely normal to feel that way. Have you heard back from any of them yet?
Not yet, but I’m trying to be patient.
That’s a healthy mindset. While you wait, how has your week been in terms of cooking and exercising?
I managed to cook that pasta recipe I mentioned! It turned out really well.
That’s excellent! How did it feel to make it?
It was fun! I felt accomplished.
Cooking can be such a rewarding experience. Did you find time for your exercise goal too?
I went for two runs! It felt good to get back into it.
Awesome! It sounds like you’re making great progress. How did those runs feel?
They helped clear my mind a lot. I felt energized afterward.
That’s wonderful to hear. It sounds like you’re finding a good balance. Have you had any moments of annoyance this week?
Yes, actually. I had a disagreement with a friend, but I tried to write it down like we discussed.
How did that go for you?
It helped! I was able to express my feelings better when we talked.
That’s a significant step forward. What did you learn from that experience?
I realized that I need to communicate more openly instead of shutting down.
That’s a valuable insight. How do you feel about continuing to work on that communication?
I want to keep improving. It feels good to express myself.
I’m glad to hear that. We can continue to explore that in our sessions. Is there anything else you’d like to address today?
I’ve been thinking about my future and what I want to do with my life.
That’s an important topic. What specific thoughts do you have about your future?
I’m just worried about finding a job that I’ll actually enjoy.
It’s understandable to have those concerns. Have you thought about what aspects of a job would make you happy?
I think I’d like something that allows me to be creative and work with people.
Those are great qualities to look for. Are there any specific industries or roles that interest you?
Maybe marketing or something in event planning.
Those fields can certainly provide opportunities for creativity and collaboration. Would you like to explore ways to learn more about those industries?
Yes, I’d like that. Maybe I could reach out to people in those fields for advice.
That’s a proactive approach! Networking can be very beneficial. How do you feel about setting a goal to reach out to a couple of people this week?
That sounds like a good idea! I’ll try to do that.
Excellent! It sounds like you’re making strides in many areas of your life. I’m proud of the progress you’re making.
Thank you! I appreciate your support.
You’re welcome! Remember, it’s all about taking small steps. Let’s check in on your goals next time and see how everything is progressing.
Sounds good! I’m looking forward to it.
Me too! Have a great week, and take care.
Bye!
Bye!
